EmailTemplate.name: RFP Approval Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: RFP/RFR Submitted for Approval - Employer Name: {!Incumbent_Carrier__c.Account_Name__c}/DBA: {!Incumbent_Carrier__c.DBA_if_any_n__c} Employer Type: {!Incumbent_Carrier__c.Email_Employer_Type__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
RFP/RFR Form: {!Incumbent_Carrier__c.Name} for {!Incumbent_Carrier__c.Account_Name__c}/DBA: {!Incumbent_Carrier__c.DBA_if_any_n__c}, {!Incumbent_Carrier__c.Email_Employer_Type__c} has been submitted for Approval.
Thank you.
